title: [BUG] updateEpic enum allows ARCHIVED (invalid) and omits PLANNED (valid)
description: In updateEpic.ts:18, the inputSchema enum is ['ACTIVE', 'COMPLETED', 'ARCHIVED'] but schema.ts:25 defines EpicStatus = 'PLANNED' | 'ACTIVE' | 'COMPLETED'. Fix: change enum to ['PLANNED', 'ACTIVE', 'COMPLETED'] to match schema.
definitionOfDone: updateEpic inputSchema enum matches EpicStatus type in schema.ts
Setting status to PLANNED via updateEpic works
Setting status to ARCHIVED is rejected

implementationPlan.description: Fix the inputSchema enum in updateEpic.ts line 18: change ['ACTIVE', 'COMPLETED', 'ARCHIVED'] to ['PLANNED', 'ACTIVE', 'COMPLETED'] to match the EpicStatus type in schema.ts.
